titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Queenes Maiesties will and commaundement, to haue certaine lawes and orders put in execution against the excesse of apparell, notified by her commandement in the Starrechamber the xiij. of Februarie in the xxx. yeere of her reigne
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
publicationStmt.date: 19. Martij. Anno 1587. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis. [i.e 1588].

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; year date given according to Lady Day dating.

Another issue of STC 8168.5, with additions: sheets 4-6 with caption title on sheet 4 "A brief content of certaine clauses of the statue of King Henry the eight, and Queene Mary, with some moderations thereof to be obserued accordingly." which reprints sheets 2-4 of STC 8066. Sheets 4 and 5 are signed "D" and "E", respectively, at the bottom. Sheet 2 has the same setting and text as STC 8168.5 but is reimposed and signed "B" at bottom. Sheet 3 is reimposed, omitting imprint and adding leading above and below the headings.--STC.
Imperfect: at reel 2283:15a, first sheet only, bound and filmed preceding sheet 2 of 8168.5.
Reproductions of the originals in: Bodleian Library (reel 565:38), and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2283:15a) .
